properties.areaDesc: Ziebach; Perkins; Northern Meade Co Plains
properties.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 15 at 1:12PM MST until January 16 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Rapid City SD
properties.description:
* WHAT...Very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as
30 below zero.

* WHERE...Perkins County, the Northern Meade County Plains and
Ziebach County.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 10 AM MST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on
exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
properties.instruction:
A wind chill advisory means the combination of wind and cold
temperatures will create dangerously low wind chill values. If
you go outside, cover all parts of your body, especially your
head, face, and hands.

NWSheadline: WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM MST THURSDAY
